verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Keep <S%H8104><s%> ye judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> justice: <S%H6666><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> my salvation <S%H3444><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to come, <S%H935><s%> and my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to be revealed. <S%H1540><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H582><s%> that doeth <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> and the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> that layeth hold <S%H2388><s%> on it; that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> from polluting <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2490><s%> it, and keepeth <S%H8104><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from doing <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%>

Neither <S%H408><s%> let the son <S%H1121><s%> of the stranger, <S%H5236><s%> that hath joined himself <S%H3867><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath utterly separated <S%H914><s%> <S%H914><s%> me from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> his people: <S%H5971><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> let the eunuch <S%H5631><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am a dry <S%H3002><s%> tree. <S%H6086><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> that <S%H834><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and choose <S%H977><s%> the things that <S%H834><s%> please <S%H2654><s%> me, and take hold <S%H2388><s%> of my covenant; <S%H1285><s%>

Even unto them will I give <S%H5414><s%> in mine house <S%H1004><s%> and within my walls <S%H2346><s%> a place <S%H3027><s%> and a name <S%H8034><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than of sons <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and of daughters: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1323><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> them an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> that <S%H834><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>

Also the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the stranger, <S%H5236><s%> that join themselves <S%H3867><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to serve <S%H8334><s%> him, and to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> from polluting <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2490><s%> it, and taketh hold <S%H2388><s%> of my covenant; <S%H1285><s%>

Even them will I bring <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and make them joyful <S%H8055><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%> of prayer: <S%H8605><s%> their burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be accepted <S%H7522><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> mine altar; <S%H4196><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> mine house <S%H1004><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> of prayer <S%H8605><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

The Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> which gathereth <S%H6908><s%> the outcasts <S%H1760><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saith, <S%H5002><s%> Yet <S%H5750><s%> will I gather <S%H6908><s%> others to <S%H5921><s%> him, beside those that are gathered <S%H6908><s%> unto him.
All <S%H3605><s%> ye beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> come <S%H857><s%> to devour, <S%H398><s%> yea, all <S%H3605><s%> ye beasts <S%H2416><s%> in the forest. <S%H3293><s%>

His watchmen <S%H6822><s%> are blind: <S%H5787><s%> they are all <S%H3605><s%> ignorant, <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3045><s%> they are all <S%H3605><s%> dumb <S%H483><s%> dogs, <S%H3611><s%> they cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> bark; <S%H5024><s%> sleeping, <S%H1957><s%> lying down, <S%H7901><s%> loving <S%H157><s%> to slumber. <S%H5123><s%>

Yea, they are greedy <S%H5794><s%> <S%H5315><s%> dogs <S%H3611><s%> which can never <S%H3808><s%> have <S%H3045><s%> enough, <S%H7654><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> are shepherds <S%H7462><s%> that cannot <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3808><s%> understand: <S%H995><s%> they all <S%H3605><s%> look <S%H6437><s%> to their own way, <S%H1870><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> for his gain, <S%H1215><s%> from his quarter. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%>

Come <S%H857><s%> ye, say they, I will fetch <S%H3947><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> and we will fill <S%H5433><s%> ourselves with strong drink; <S%H7941><s%> and tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> as this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and much <S%H3966><s%> more abundant. <S%H3499><s%> <S%H1419><s%>
